properties.name: Al-Ghabawi Landfill biogas power plant
properties.description:
A landfill repurposed to produce biogas and generate power at a capacity of 5 MW.
The project was contracted to CNTY China,  Christopher D. Constantinidis S.A. – HELECTOR S.A and i-frantzis associates Ltd. It started operating in 2019 and is owned by the Greater Amman Municipality in coordination with MEMR.
